MOV N, R0		address 0
XnOR R1, R1		address 2
MOV #20, R3		address 3
Label3:		address 5
MOV -(R3), M		address 5
DEC R0		address 7
CMP #18, @R3		address 8
BHI Label1		address 10
MOV  #18, @R3		address 11
Label1:		address 13
DEC R0		address 13
BEQ Label2		address 14
INC R3		address 15
Label2:		address 16
BR Label3		address 16
HLT		address 17
Define  N  7		address 18
Define M  5		address 19
